quest_desc.qdesc: 안 보이는 도둑과 대화. 상인 메이와 대화. 습격자들의 매복지에서 코볼트 퇴치. 메이와 대화. 메이에게 받은 세제를 안 보이는 도둑에게 전달. 케빈과 대화. 끝.

talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Kevin$
You still haven't found my dad's ring? Really?
(Go talk to the thief near the elite soldiers' tents.)

$Airship Engineer Hubert$
Did you make any progress on catching the thief? Kevin could really use some good news, I'd say.
(Go talk to the thief near the elite soldiers' tents.)

$Merchant May$
Blacksmith Corin was talking about some kind of Hound abuse or something... Has he finally gone crazy?
(Go talk to the thief near the elite soldiers' tents.)

$Invisible Thief$
Are you here for the ring, Mr. Goody-Two-Shoes Adventurer?

$Invisible Thief$
Hey. No point in being so pushy, friend. Besides, I've had a lot of trouble because of that useless ring. This smell still won't go away!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I'm not going to steal anything for you!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Invisible Thief$
Hey don't be so curt.
Look, I'm in a fix, and you need this ring back. Clearly, a deal can be made. What do you say? Help me out, and the ring is yours.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Well, I do know who made it...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Invisible Thief$
Good! Because I didn't ask you to steal, stupid! I need no help with my sacred work.
I just want your help in getting this horrible smell off me. You seem to know where it came from, so you should be able to find a way to get it off. Right?
<html>$The Invisible Man$</html>

$Invisible Thief$
Then go talk to the person who made it! You're not getting this ring until this smell is gone. And no funny business, or I'm gone... Since I'm invisible!

$Kevin$
You still haven't found my dad's ring? Really?
(Go talk to the thief near the elite soldiers' tents.)

$Merchant May$
Blacksmith Corin was talking about some kind of Hound abuse or something... Has he finally gone crazy?
(Go talk to the thief near the elite soldiers' tents.)

$Airship Engineer Hubert$
Did you make any progress on catching the thief? Kevin could really use some good news, I'd say.
(Go talk to the thief near the elite soldiers' tents.)

$Invisible Thief$
Hey. No point in being so pushy, friend. Besides, I've had a lot of trouble because of that useless ring. This smell still won't go away!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I'm not going to steal anything for you!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Invisible Thief$
Hey don't be so curt.
Look, I'm in a fix, and you need this ring back. Clearly, a deal can be made. What do you say? Help me out, and the ring is yours.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Well, I do know who made it...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Invisible Thief$
Good! Because I didn't ask you to steal, stupid! I need no help with my sacred work.
I just want your help in getting this horrible smell off me. You seem to know where it came from, so you should be able to find a way to get it off. Right?
<html>$The Invisible Man$</html>

$Invisible Thief$
Then go talk to the person who made it! You're not getting this ring until this smell is gone. And no funny business, or I'm gone... I'm invisible!

$Invisible Thief$
Go to the person who made this horrible muck and find out how to remove the smell. You'll get your precious ring once I'm clean again. Haha.

$Merchant May$
Wow, it's been too long, adventurer!
Is there anything you need?

$Merchant May$
What? The smell? Hmm... I gave Airship Engineer Hubert the bucket along with the chow because the smell wouldn't come out of THAT! Phew, I didn't expect a fool to step on it.

$Merchant May$
Well...I've had an idea for a new Super Strength Detergent in my head for awhile. If you can help me get the components, I'll make some for you. That should get the smell out...I hope.

$Merchant May$
Alright. Can you get me something from Raider's Ambush Point?
While you're gone, I'll prepare the rest.

$Merchant May${action:talk}
I need Fermented Nuts. The kobold archers there usually carry them for...something. They are very acidic and have a very strong scent, so they could help to remove the smell. Please get me 5 of them.

$Merchant May${action:talk}
I need Fermented Nuts. The kobold archers there usually carry them for...something. They are very acidic and have a very strong scent, so they could help to remove the smell. Please get me 5 of them.

$Merchant May$
Oooohh, geez! I could smell those when you first got back to town. Just that sour smell makes my lips pucker! But they have to be that strong to remove such horrible smells, right?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(You watch the liquid as she drops the nuts in. For a moment, it starts...boiling?)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Merchant May$
Okay... alright... I've got everything prepared, so just wait a minute.
(May mixes a red liquid inside a large bowl.)
Now, if I just drop the Fermented Nuts in this...

$Merchant May$
There! It's done. (May hands you a vial of very sweet-smelling liquid.)
That was tough! But, you got your cleaner, and I have some left over to sell! Hee hee! Come back anytime!

$Merchant May$
I gave you the Super Strength Detergent already. What is it this time? Oh...are you looking for a date?
(Go talk to the thief near the elite soldiers' tents.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Here, try this. (You give him the Super Strength Detergent.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Invisible Thief$
Guh! Are you candy-coated now? What's that sugary smell?

$Invisible Thief$
Is this stuff really going to work? I swear, if I end up smelling like a candy shop...
(You see the vial floating, and the liquid splashing on something.)
Wow! It really worked! I smell normal again.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I think you owe me the ring.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Invisible Thief$
Hey, you're a pretty handy friend. I think I owe you my story now.

$Invisible Thief$
How selfish you are! I don't tell just anybody this story. Do you know the legendary thief Shupin? He was a master thief and creator of all kinds of amazing tools, like the Peeking Magnifying Glass.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Fine, I'll bite. Why would you want to do that?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Invisible Thief$
You really don't know him? I know they say that the White Rose or whatever is famous in Saint Haven now, but Shupin is famous all over the world! Look, the point is, I want to become a legendary thief like the great Shupin.

$Invisible Thief$
You see, I didn't always want to be a thief. I was originally a sorcerer, one of the few men that could use Vision Magic. But after Karahan abandoned the Dark Tower and all, things were pretty hard for men like me.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Stole the chemicals? You were always a thief!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Invisible Thief$
I kept studying, but I couldn't make much progress on my own. I needed an easier way. Rumor had it that the Royal Court Sorceress was experimenting with chemicals that could boost magical power. I stole the chemicals, but I guess I mixed them wrong... They exploded, and I thought for sure I was dead. When I awoke, though, I found I was fine, but completely invisible.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Well, that's a shame. Can I have the ring now?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Invisible Thief$
I don't expect you to understand how I felt. But, since I was stuck being invisible for all eternity, I decided to make the most of it. I chose to become the greatest thief since Shupin, and stowed away on the airship to get out of Saint Haven and see the world. Of course, then it crashed...and I almost died...alone, and unseen.

$Invisible Thief$
Well...thanks for listening to my tale. Perhaps we'll meet again sometime. Take care, friend... (His voice is fading...you realize he's running away! And he never gave you the ring!)

$Invisible Thief$
...
(The thief must be long-gone by now. He got away with the ring, but you should probably check in with Airship Engineer Hubert or Kevin anyway.)

$Airship Engineer Hubert$
Hey there. Kevin's been raving about how he found his ring. Good job, sneaking it back to him like that. Good thinking. Shame the thief got away, huh? I mean, he did get away, yeah? I don't see him tied up anywhere. Still, good job.

$Kevin$
Hey! Heyyy!
I found it! I found the ring! Check this out!
(Kevin shows you the ring.)

$Kevin$
I found it in a pretty bowl a few moments ago. It even had a big ribbon tied on it. Haha! I guess you made the thief feel all guilty, so he gave it back! Yay!

$Kevin$
Oh! There was a letter here, too.

$Letter$
I have decided to return the ring. It is not worth anything to me, nor is anything in your pathetic little town. I am starting a great journey around the world, to steal only the best and finest, and to become the next great phantom thief. Farewell...for now!
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

$Kevin$
From now on, I'm keeping this ring hidden, so nobody can find it! Except me. Hey, does this ring smell funny to you...?

journal.title: The Invisible Thief
journal.contents:
Talk to the Invisible Thief, hiding near the tents of the elite soldiers.

Calderock Village → Invisible Thief
journal.destination: Talk to the Invisible Thief at Calderock Village

journal.title: The Smell-Breaker
journal.contents:
The Invisible Thief says that he will return the ring if you help rid him of the horrible smell. Ask May supplies dealers how to remove the smell.

Calderock Village → Merchant May
journal.todo_msg: Ask Merchant May how to remove the smell.

journal.title: Fermented Nuts
journal.contents:
Defeat the Ambusher Kobold Archers at Raider's Ambush Point and obtain the Fermented Nuts.

Cristal Stream (Raider's Den Entrance) → Raiders Ambush Point
journal.destination: Defeat the Kobolds at Raiders Ambush Point
journal.todo_msg: Gather the Fermented Nuts at Raiders Ambush Point.

journal.title: Report
journal.contents:
You've collected all the Fermented Nuts. Report to Merchant May.

Calderock Village →Merchant May
journal.todo_msg: Deliver the Fermented Nuts to Merchant May

journal.title: A Thief's Story
journal.contents:
You've obtained the Super Strength Detergent. Deliver it to the Invisible Thief near the tents of the elite soldiers.

Calderock Village → Invisible Thief
journal.todo_msg: Deliver the Super Strength Detergent to the Invisible Thief.

journal.title: Lost or Found
journal.contents:
The Invisible Thief disappeared without returning the ring! Check with Kevin.

Calderock Village → Kevin
